title: Alpecin-Fenix and Van der Poel withdraw from UAE Tour due to positive COVID-19 test
content:
Alpecin-Fenix will not start stage 2 of the UAE Tour after a staff member tested positive for coronavirus. Mathieu van der Poel, who won the first stage of the tour, would have worn the leaderâ€™s jersey into the stage 2 time trial.

Testing was conducted on the evening of the first stage. The UAE Tour released a statement saying that the member of staff who tested positive was immediately isolated, as were those who came into close contact with them.

David Dekker (Team Jumbo-Visma), who placed second on the opening stage, will start stage 2 as the leader in the general classification.

This story is ongoing.

Tags
author: Abby Mickey
